text: Motion
Motion
Between you and me...
Recently, I've been really into bread.

Oh, really?
Any specific types of bread you're into?

Yeah,
I've been doing a comparison of croissants in particular.
The ones from the bakery near the station are superb─
But I can't really say that, huh.

Haha...
Well, we wouldn't want your neighborhood to find out.
──... Now, what do you think, Producer?

Now, let me think... Is that last bit appropriate for a
"between you and me" question?
Hmm...!

Sakuya's recent updates or getting to know her
preferences, it's privileged information, but──

Well, it's still a bit lacking in
charm or freshness, isn't it──……

It's tough, you know? It's hard to come up with
cool stories when you have to answer yourself.

If I may speak, I'd say,
"Just between us, quite the heartthrob".

I'll share the story from the other day when
I was asked for directions by three people in one day.

Haha...
that was just a coincidence.

No, no.
I think it's because Sakuya seems kind and approachable.

──Oh, but now that I think about it,
it's not really 'just between us,' is it?

Especially for fans,
everyone knows that Sakuya is kind.
Well...
...But, you know.

There's the me that everyone doesn't know, and the me that
everyone wants to know── I have to discern that line correctly.

Ah, it would be nice if we could meet in person and have a chat.
Then, I could talk about everything you want to know.

──… Sakuya, she seems like she would
sincerely answer anything, doesn't she?
Even if it's something difficult to answer,
Oh, of course, right?

I became an idol because I wanted to connect with someone.
I don't have time to pretend.
It would be a waste if our hearts didn't connect.
──Yeah, that's right.

──… I think it would be good to convey
those feelings again, though…

…But it's not really "just between us", is it?
It feels like everyone already knows!

Haha.
If that's what you think, then I'm honored.

──… I still need to think about it.
It has to be a feature article that lives up to expectations.

It's appreciated that you're working hard, but,
Don't push yourself too hard, okay?

There are lessons, other jobs, and school.
After all, Sakuya only has one body.
Thank you for your concern.

But this isn't really hard work, you know.
After all, I'm enjoying it.

Hey, Producer,
What kind of me do you think everyone wants to know?

Haha, well…!
You can't beat Sakuya.
Haha, I wonder why──
